physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white negative of a photograph. It features three men. All of them are standing up and looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. The man on the right hand side of the photograph is wearing a shirt and tie, while the other two men are wearing their ethnic costumes. The background displays a building, along with some greenery.
sgcool_label_text: This plastic film negative shows two bibiks from Penang.
title_text: Negative of three men Negative of two bibiks from Penang
subject_terms_1: group portraits men (male humans) folk costume
subject_terms_2: Portrait photography Portraits, Group Men Ethnic costume
